summary: The Food and Drug Administration helps ensure the safety of human medical products and more than 80% of the U.S. food supply, among other things. The Food and Drug Omnibus Reform Act of 2022 includes a provision that we assess how an office within FDA handles correspondence for FDA's Commissioner. The office receives letters and emails that its staff must determine where to route. Correspondence...
title: Food and Drug Administration: Office of the Executive Secretariat's Processes for Correspondence Were Consistent with Selected Internal Control Standards
